channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16947] Semijoin Reduction : Task cycle created due to multiple semijoins in conjunction with hashjoin
item.description: Typically a semijoin branch and a mapjoin may create a cycle when on same operator tree. This is already handled, however, a semijoin branch can serve more than one filters and the cycle detection logic currently only handles the 1st one causing cycles preventing the queries from running.
item.summary: Semijoin Reduction : Task cycle created due to multiple semijoins in conjunction with hashjoin

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
